Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util.consensus

The Consensus package will compute Consensus for a given Slice.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConsensusCaller
    ConsensusCaller compute the ConsensusResult for the given Slice.
    ConsensusResult
    ConsensusResult is the base call and quality value that best represents a particular Slice in a Contig.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcgtnConsensusCaller
    AcgtnConsensusCaller is just like NoAmbiguityConsensusCaller except if the slice does not have any A,C,G or Ts then it will call an N.
    ChurchillWatermanConsensusCaller
    ChurchillWatermanConsensusCaller is a ConsensusCaller that uses calculates a ConsensusResult for a slice using the Bayes formula and the procedure from
    ConicConsensusCaller
    ConicConsensusCaller calls consensus using the "Conic Ambiguity Model".
    ConsensusCollectors
    Utility class of Collectors that can compute Consensus sequence from a Stream of sequence data.
    NextGenReferenceConsensusRecaller
    NextGenReferenceConsensusRecaller is a special ConsensusCaller implementation designed for recalling the consensus from a reference based mapping assembly that contains reads from "next-generation" sequencing technologies.
    NoAmbiguityConsensusCaller
    NoAmbiguityConsensusCaller will always return the either A,C,G, T or gap as the consensus, whichever has the lowest error probability.
    TigrAnnotationConsensusCaller
    AnnotationConsensusCaller is the Consensus caller used by the TIGR Annotation Group.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MostFrequentBasecallConsensusCaller
    MostFrequentBasecallConsensusCaller is a ConsensusCaller implementation that will return the most frequent basecall in a Slice and the Consensus Quality is the sum of all the qualities of the reads with that basecall minus the sum of the reads without that basecall.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util.consensus Description

The Consensus package will compute Consensus for a given Slice.
